LanguageData.SadjuukColonization.label: UN Colonization Programm
LanguageData.SadjuukColonization.description: Opening of the United Nations Colonization Program's recommendations and technologies.
LanguageData.SadjuukMetallurgyA.label: Bessemer Converter
LanguageData.SadjuukMetallurgyA.description: The Bessemer Converter will allow your colony to process industrially raw steel.
LanguageData.SadjuukMetallurgyB.label: Open Hearth Furnace
LanguageData.SadjuukMetallurgyB.description: The Open Hearth Furnace is the improvement of the Bessemer Converter.
LanguageData.SadjuukMetallurgyC.label: Electric Arc Furnace.
LanguageData.SadjuukMetallurgyC.description: Research how to process row steel with the powerful Electric Arc Furnace technology.
LanguageData.SadjuukProductionA.label: Production Lines
LanguageData.SadjuukProductionA.description: This research allow your colony to build efficient Production Lines.
LanguageData.SadjuukProductionB.label: Machine Tools
LanguageData.SadjuukProductionB.description: Machine Tools using to improve your production lines.
LanguageData.SadjuukProductionC.label: Industrial Robotics.
LanguageData.SadjuukProductionC.description: Devlops Industrial Robotics that are more efficient than machine tools.
LanguageData.SadjuukFuelOilA.label: Fuel Oil Refining
LanguageData.SadjuukFuelOilB.label: Fuel Oil Generator A
LanguageData.SadjuukFuelOilC.label: Fuel Oil Generator B
LanguageData.SadjuukFuelOilC.description: An improvement of the generator A.

LanguageData.SadjuukHydrogenA.label: Advanced Refining
LanguageData.SadjuukHydrogenA.description: Allows the Hydrogen, explosives and chemicals Production in the Advanced Refining. A portable Hydrogen fuel cell is also available.
